definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: The company describes its process as a 'human photocopier'.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司将其描述为人类的复印机。

sentences.english: The Xerox is a good office assistant, which you never get tired of using.
sentences.chinese: 静电复印机，文秘好助手，百用不厌。

sentences.english: He made contact with someone with an idea for reconditioning laser copiers.
sentences.chinese: 他联系了一个会修理激光复印机的人。

sentences.english: The categories of the lubricated duplicators are intricate.
sentences.chinese: 那些润滑过的复印机的种类错综复杂。

sentences.english: I'm here to fix the copier.
What abut operating the fax and duplicators？
sentences.chinese: 你会发传真和使用复印机吗？

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of October 10 for business copiers.
sentences.chinese: 感激贵圆10月10日闭于商用复印机的询函。

sentences.english: Xerox' is a proprietary name and may not be used by other makers of photocopiers.
sentences.chinese: 施乐＇为专利名称，制造复印机的其他厂家不得采用。

sentences.english: The principle of color generation and the theory of optical system design in color xerographic copiers are briefly described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 简述彩色静电复印机的成色原理和光学系统设计理论。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of October 10 for business copiers.
sentences.chinese: 感谢贵方10月10日关于商用复印机的询函。

sentences.english: A: Well, I think I've got the copier running. I pressed the button but nothing came out.
sentences.chinese: 我想我已经开了复印机，但是按了按钮没反映。
复印机打印出来是二维的。

sentences.english: A copier that has been used a lot often has some dark smudges.
sentences.chinese: 复印机经常使用常会出现黑色的脏污。

sentences.english: Please quickly put these duplicating papers into the duplicator.
sentences.chinese: 你快把这些复印纸装入复印机。

sentences.english: Harry, have you called about repairing the photocopier?
sentences.chinese: 你打电话叫人修复印机了吗？
